name: Don't Panic! (itch)
description:
Global Game Jam 2017

Theme: Waves | Diversifier: Chipping In

Award: Coup De Coeur

Don't Panic is an award winning game jam game that was inspired by Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. The idea is to use your space dolphin's sonar waves to pop bubbles and find fish - 42 to be exact. Careful though, other alien dolphins aren't going to let you eat the fish for free. Use your laser to shoot at enemy dolphins before they knock you into debris and eat all the fish for themselves!

Don't Panic's fun game play and widespread love for Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, had the jugde's award it the Coup De Coeur award at the ETS location in Montreal, Quebec.

Link: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/dont-panic
